channel.title: How to add talkign npcs?
channel.description:
Ok i went into autospawn and created a npc, now how do i make it talk..?
WARNING: It was not talking before! :o :rolleyes:

item.title: How to add talkign npcs?
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

[quote=“King Lingerz, post:4, topic:229851”][quote author=ownager55 link=topic=302466.msg2426944#msg2426944 date=1220658608]
Ok i went into autospawn and created a npc, now how do i make it talk…?

WARNING: It was not talking before! :o :rolleyes:
[/quote]Go into NPChandler. Somewhere (sorry, not sure where) put something like this:
if (npcs[i].npcType == ####) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "What the npc is saying goes here"; } }

make sure you include the “”’; I forgot that alot and kept getting tons of errors. I am of course, about 90% sure this is how :). If I wrong, whoops. If not, awesome :D[/quote]
Fixed it for you.

Read full topic

}
if (npcs[i].npcType == code of npc you want to talk) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “What the npc is saying goes here”;

make sure you include the “”’; I forgot that alot and kept getting tons of errors. I am of course, about 90% sure this is how :). If I wrong, whoops. If not, awsome
